languages.text:
{n}Волосы Волка встают дыбом, рот, полный длинных острых зубов, похож на жуткую пасть:{/n}
"Хья! Не ведаю я тепла очагов,
Не помню уж голосов своих братьев,
Слышу лишь свист я морозного ветра,
Ведаю жар только пролитой крови!"

{n}The Wolf's hair stands on end and his mouth bristles with long, sharp teeth, resembling the maw of a fearsome beast:{/n}
"Hja!
Warmth of hearths unkenning,
My brothers' voices forgetting,
Only whistling ice-wind harking,
Only steam of spilt blood scenting!"
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
{n}乌尔法的头发根根竖了起来，露出了嘴里又长又尖的牙齿，就像可怕野兽的巨口一般。{/n}
“喝呀！
温暖的炉火无人安坐，
狼群的声音已然遗落。
只有阴冷的冰风在呼啸！
只有鲜血的热气在嚎叫！”
languages.original_text:
{n}The Wolf's hair stands on end and his mouth bristles with long, sharp teeth, resembling the maw of a fearsome beast:{/n}
"Hja!
Warmth of hearths unkenning,
My brothers' voices forgetting,
Only whistling ice-wind harking,
Only steam of spilt blood scenting!"

traits.locale_text:
{n}乌尔法的头发根根竖了起来，露出了嘴里又长又尖的牙齿，就像可怕野兽的巨口一般。{/n}
“喝呀！
温暖的炉火无人安坐，
狼群的声音已然遗落。
只有阴冷的冰风在呼啸！
只有鲜血的热气在嚎叫！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}狼は髪を逆立たせ、恐ろしい獣の口そっくりに長く鋭い歯を露わにし、怒りを見せている。{/n}
「ヤー！
火床のあたたかさを知らず、
我が同胞の声を忘れ、
冷たき風の音だけが耳に届く、
血しぶきの湯気だけが鼻腔を満たす！」
languages.original_text:
{n}The Wolf's hair stands on end and his mouth bristles with long, sharp teeth, resembling the maw of a fearsome beast:{/n}
"Hja!
Warmth of hearths unkenning,
My brothers' voices forgetting,
Only whistling ice-wind harking,
Only steam of spilt blood scenting!"

languages.text:
{n}Les poils du Loup se hérissent et sa bouche révèle de longues dents acérées pareilles aux crocs d'une bête redoutable.{/n}
« Hja !
La tiédeur de l'âtre disparue,
la voix de mes frères oubliée,
ne reste que le souffle glacial du vent,
ne reste que la chaude odeur du sang ! »
languages.original_text:
{n}The Wolf's hair stands on end and his mouth bristles with long, sharp teeth, resembling the maw of a fearsome beast:{/n}
"Hja!
Warmth of hearths unkenning,
My brothers' voices forgetting,
Only whistling ice-wind harking,
Only steam of spilt blood scenting!"

languages.text:
{n}Die Haare des Wolfs stehen zu Berge, und die langen, spitzen Zähne in seinem Mund erinnern an den Schlund einer furchterregenden Bestie:{/n}
"Ha!
Unbekannt die Wärme des Feuers,
vergessen die Stimme der Brüder.
Nur pfeifender, eisiger Wind,
nur der Geruch dampfenden Bluts!"
languages.original_text:
{n}The Wolf's hair stands on end and his mouth bristles with long, sharp teeth, resembling the maw of a fearsome beast:{/n}
"Hja!
Warmth of hearths unkenning,
My brothers' voices forgetting,
Only whistling ice-wind harking,
Only steam of spilt blood scenting!"

languages.text:
{n}Kurt'un saçları diken diken oluyor, korkunç bir canavarın ağzını andıran uzun ve keskin dişlerini gösteriyor.{/n}
"Hja!
Kalplerin sıcaklığı bilinmez,
Kardeşlerimin sesleri unutulur.
Donduran rüzgârdan başkası işitilmez,
Bir tek dökülen kanın kokusu duyulur!"
languages.original_text:
{n}The Wolf's hair stands on end and his mouth bristles with long, sharp teeth, resembling the maw of a fearsome beast:{/n}
"Hja!
Warmth of hearths unkenning,
My brothers' voices forgetting,
Only whistling ice-wind harking,
Only steam of spilt blood scenting!"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Kurt'un saçları diken diken oluyor ve ağzındaki korkunç bir canavarın ağzını andıran uzun ve keskin dişleri gösteriyor:{/n}
"Hja!
Kalplerin sıcaklığı bilinmez.
Kardeşlerimin sesleri unutulur.
Sadece donduran rüzgâr duyulur.
Sadece dökülen kanın kokusu alınır!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
